de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.content

Class WebAnnotationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.content.WebAnnotationResource

  • @Path(value="/webannotation")
public class WebAnnotationResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource for delivering content documents such as ALTO and plain full-text.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
        WebAnnotationResource() 
      protected WebAnnotationResource(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      For testing

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommentAnnotation getAnnotation(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns an annotation for the comment with the given database ID.
      CommentAnnotationCollection getAnnotationsForPage(java.lang.String pi, java.lang.Integer page)
      Returns an annotation collection containing comment annotations for the given record page.
      CommentAnnotationCollection getAnnotationsForRecord(java.lang.String pi)
      Returns an annotation collection containing comment annotations for the given record.
